job.title: Systems Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtJob descriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe Systems Engineer will be responsible for the oversight and administration of Keycentrixs IT assets both hardware and software This position will provide solution architecture development and deployment for Keycentrix internal users The position requires strong troubleshooting and diagnostic skills the ability to research design and implement new solutions from the ground up as well as strong communication and leadership skillsltpgtltpgtltstronggtEssential Job Responsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgt Develops IT solutions for Keycentrixs internal customers Provides IT architecture solutions to meet our critical business needsltpgtltpgt Administers the installation and operation of all Keycentrix LANWAN related network services and security and control measuresltpgtltpgt Troubleshoots and resolves LANWAN performance connectivity and related network problemsltpgtltpgt Performs installations upgrades and support of computer hardware and software for internal customersltpgtltpgt Oversees IT projects ensuring smooth and successful executionltpgtltpgt Collaborates with internal customers and vendors on all projects timelines and budgetsltpgtltpgt Advises and supports all company policies and procedures pertaining to IT administrationltpgtltpgt Communicates effectively with all internal customers ensuring customer satisfaction and strong business relationshipsltpgtltpgt Oversees the documentation of all Keycentrix systems and procedures within the scope of IT architecture installation support and operationsltpgtltpgt Performs any assigned tasks associated with support of external Keycentrix customers as directedltpgtltpgt Trains and may provide work direction to IT TechniciansltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt Solid technical skills and experience with a variety of network protocols software and hardware involved in LAN and WAN operationsltpgtltpgt Strong troubleshooting analytic and diagnostic skillsltpgtltpgt IT architecture skillsltpgtltpgt Strong project planning skillsltpgtltpgt Ability to perform highlevel root cause analysis of technical issuesltpgtltpgt Ability to communicate effectively with technical and nontechnical usersltpgtltpgt Selfstarter but able to work with and leadmentor othersltpgtltpgt Availability to perform oncall work when necessaryltpgtltpgt Excellent communication skillsltpgtltpgt Project management experienceltpgtltpgt Disaster recovery and planning experienceltpgtltpgt Minimum 3 years of experience in at least 7 of the following areasltpgtltpgt TCPIP networkingltpgtltpgt WAN LAN WLANltpgtltpgt Standard network protocols HTTPS FTP SMTP SSL BGP EIGRP etcltpgtltpgt VLANsltpgtltpgt VMware virtual server and workstation environmentsltpgtltpgt Active Directory environments 2012 and aboveltpgtltpgt Microsoft Operating Systems Server and Desktopltpgtltpgt VPN and remote access methodologiesltpgtltpgt Server and desktop hardware installation configuration and support skillsltpgtltpgt SonicWall firewall and network security experienceltpgtltpgt Backup and DR solutions specifically VeeamltpgtltpgtltstronggtOther Preferred Skillsltstronggtltpgtltpgt CCNA or CCNP certificationltpgtltpgt MCSE MCSA certificationltpgtltpgt Network designarchitecture experienceltpgtltpgt VOIP telephony solutionsltpgtltpgt Microsoft Cloud solutions SharePoint Office 365ltpgtltpgt SAN NAS storage solution experience specifically with Nimble EqualLogic NetApp EMCltpgtltpgt Experience with network monitoring and performance tuningltpgtltpgt Linux Ubuntu Red Hat CentOSltpgtltpgt SQL databases SQL Server PostgreSQL Oracleltpgtltpgt Docker Kubernetes or other container solutionsltpgtltpgtltstronggtEducation or Certificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt Bachelors degree in Computer Science desired or commensurate degree and experience combinationltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout KeycentrixltstronggtltpgtltpgtKeycentrix is a software and technology company based in Wichita Kansas For over 40 years we have provided powerful and affordable software that helps Independent Retail and Mailorder Pharmacies thrive We also provide bestinclass software solutions for Specialty Pharmacies with Newleaf software allowing pharmacies to run better smarter and faster while maintaining hightouch care for the communities and patients served Learn more about our full range of software and IT services at keycentrixcomltpgtltpgtWe are proud to announce that we recently won the prestigious 2019 Surescripts White Coat Award for eprescriptions accuracy httpswwwpharmacytimescomnewskeycentrixwinssurescripts2019whitecoatawardforprescriptionaccuracyltpgtltpgtKeycentrix is a member
